trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around August 12th 1999
Summary: Very bizarre display of eight small orbs regularly circling in a clockwise formation, then coalescing into a center large mass, breaking apart, and continuously repeating the display.
divs: sighting detailson a fairly warm and pleasant summer august evening, i drove out of my parking lot,, heading east, when i noticed a very bizarre display, about 100 feet up in the sky, off to my left, above a tennis training facility and television station. eight, small, round lights, were moving in a circular, clockwise formation, joing into a center mass at the completion of the circle, then breaking out into eight round lights, again, from the center and repeating the display, endlessly. i got out of the car near the tennis facility, and stood on the sidewalk watching this formation, wondering what i was observing. i had first thought it was some sort of searchlight or advertising gimmick from somewhere in town. i went into the tennis facility, but no one knew anything about the lights, and would not go out to speculate. whereupon, i got back in my car, and headed one block west to a convenience food mart. i asked the male, teenage clerk to come out and look at the display, which he did. when i asked him what he thought he was looking at he said he had no idea. i, then, went back home and called up the television station. i asked if there was any special searchlights or advertising targeting the area. they said, none that they knew of, and would not go out and look, as they were deep in preparation for the 10 pm newcast. i called other stations and no one knew of any promotions that would explain this display. the display continued, endlessly, as i had to leave the area for a work assignment. there was nothing in the newspapers or radio\television media the following day to explain what this might have been.
